data.scheme_name: Gramodyog Vikas Yojana  - Pottery Activity  - Existing
data.benefits: To increasing the income of pottery artisans are provided with 10 days skill development training.
data.eligibility: Artisans in the age group of 18 years to 55 years  having Aadhar Card/ Voter ID with photographs  and Ration Cards, etc.
data.conditions:
1. Persons who have availed benefits from other Govt. 
  2. Schemes for the same/similar purpose will not be eligible; the beneficiary shall give declaration to this effect.
data.beneficiaries: Artisans in the age group of 18 years to 55 years  having Aadhar Card/ Voter ID with photographs  and Ration Cards, etc.
data.prerequisites:
1. Persons who have availed benefits from other Govt. 
  2. Schemes for the same/similar purpose will not be eligible; the beneficiary shall give declaration to this effect.
data.context: The scheme aims to revive the Agarbatti industry in the country by increasing indigenous production of Agarbatti, thereby reducing imports.
data.objective:
1. To enhance the production, technical knowhow of pottery artisans and to reduce cost of production 
  2. To enhance the income of pottery artisans by providing skill development training and modern & automated equipment 
  3. To provide skill-development training to SHGs of pottery-artisans on focused products like garden pots, khullad, decorator products etc. 
  4. To encourage the successful potter to set up his own unit under PMEGP scheme 
  5. To develop necessary market linkages by tying up with exports and large buying houses. 
  6. To innovate various new products and raw materials to make international scale pottery
data.description:
1. Wheel Pottery Training Programme for traditional pottery artisans. 
  2. Press Pottery training programme for pottery as well as non-pottery artisans.
  3. Jigger-Jolly training programme for pottery as well as non-pottery artisans. 
  4. Trainer's training programme for skilled traditional pottery artisans who want to work as Master Trainers. 
  5. Assistance by providing pottery wheel, Clay Blunger, Granulator etc.
data.how_to_apply: The field offices to identify the beneficiaries by conducting the awareness camp/through advertisements.
data.funding_mechanism: Direct benefit of training to be provided to the identified beneficiaries.
